title: Nitrogen Watch Face
summary: A watch face made for people that lives on the edge.
developerAddress:
Rodrigo Quesada
Villa Esperanza, Pavas, Calle 134, Avenida 17, apartamento esquinero noroeste blanco #3
San José, Costa Rica
10109 CR
description: This app brings a fresh and cool new design to your Android watch. It's for cool people only, so be sure you are fit for it before acquiring it (we are sure you are, you are an Android Wear user after all ;) ).The watch face is available in 10 different colors, so you can match it with your mood and/or style whatever it is (sure, if you are feeling radioactive one day then you can wear green or yellow, or any other color you might think it's okay).It comes with a unique design that works with any watch shape (circular or square), so you don't have to worry about the design not fitting your watch's screen (see the sample images).This watch face is specially designed using the official Watch Face API from Google, which means that it's optimized for low energy consumption when using your watch in ambient mode and for helping protect your watch's screen when used with burn-in protection. This also means that you won't need to install any other app in order to use it.Features:• Animated time indicators.• Digital indicator for seconds (shown in the center of the screen).• Available in 10 different colors (light blue, red, green, blue, fuchsia, purple, yellow, orange, pink and white).• Support for circular and square watches.• Optimized for ambient mode.• Low-bit ambient mode support.• Burn-in protection support.Feel free to contact us if you have any trouble running this app in your watch, we want to make sure everyone can enjoy wearing it! :)
descriptionHTML:
This app brings a fresh and cool new design to your Android watch. It's for cool people only, so be sure you are fit for it before acquiring it (we are sure you are, you are an Android Wear user after all ;) ).
The watch face is available in 10 different colors, so you can match it with your mood and/or style whatever it is (sure, if you are feeling radioactive one day then you can wear green or yellow, or any other color you might think it's okay).
It comes with a unique design that works with any watch shape (circular or square), so you don't have to worry about the design not fitting your watch's screen (see the sample images).
This watch face is specially designed using the official Watch Face API from Google, which means that it's optimized for low energy consumption when using your watch in ambient mode and for helping protect your watch's screen when used with burn-in protection. This also means that you won't need to install any other app in order to use it.

Features:
• Animated time indicators.
• Digital indicator for seconds (shown in the center of the screen).
• Available in 10 different colors (light blue, red, green, blue, fuchsia, purple, yellow, orange, pink and white).
• Support for circular and square watches.
• Optimized for ambient mode.
• Low-bit ambient mode support.
• Burn-in protection support.

Feel free to contact us if you have any trouble running this app in your watch, we want to make sure everyone can enjoy wearing it! :)
